channel.title: 数字花园
channel.description: 最近的10条笔记 on 数字花园

item.title: 设计模式
item.description: Quartz features an explorer that allows you to navigate all files and folders on your site. It supports nested folders and is highly customizable.

item.title: 常用芯片手册
item.description: Quartz can automatically generate a table of contents (TOC) from a list of headings on each page.

item.title: 数据结构与算法
item.description: Breadcrumbs provide a way to navigate a hierarchy of pages within your site using a list of its parent folders.

item.title: C语言
item.description: A backlink for a note is a link from another note to that note. Links in the backlink pane also feature rich 求职招聘 if you have that feature enabled.

item.title: Mermaid Diagrams
item.description: Quartz supports Mermaid which allows you to add diagrams and charts to your notes.

item.title: Wikilinks
item.description: Wikilinks were pioneered by earlier internet wikis to make it easier to write links across pages without needing to write Markdown or HTML links each time.

item.title: Obsidian Compatibility
item.description: Quartz was originally designed as a tool to publish Obsidian vaults as websites.

item.title: 测试
item.description: Quartz supports darkmode out of the box that respects the user’s theme preference.

item.title: 计算机网络
item.description: Quartz also has the ability to hook into various providers to enable readers to leave comments on your site.
